message: Module error while trying to scrape and log external temperature: error during external temperature scraping: HTTPSConnectionPool(host='api.open-meteo.com', port=443): Max retries exceeded with url: /v1/forecast?latitude=47.4984&longitude=19.0405&current_weather=true (Caused by NameResolutionError("<urllib3.connection.HTTPSConnection object at 0xf5734b50>: Failed to resolve 'api.open-meteo.com' ([Errno -3] Temporary failure in name resolution)")) (ConnectionError).
